Original:
如果你想找個地方和朋友一起出去玩，喝點酒，我推薦Sheep bar。
他們提供紅、白、日本燒酒和清酒，調酒師很友好，會說英語！
來之前一定要預約，週末有時會爆滿。
EN:
If you want to find a place to go out with friends and drink some wine, I recommend sheep bar.
They offer red, white, Japanese shochu and sake. The bartender is very friendly and speak English!
Be sure to make an appointment before you come, and sometimes it will be full on the weekend.

Original:
我在飯店的地下室發現了這家很酷的酒吧，供應燒酒（一種日本威士忌），這種酒並不常見。菜單價格合理，這是優點。我和超級友善的調酒師 Sheep 交了朋友，他對自己的手藝非常了解。我連續去了兩個晚上，從他那裡了解了很多關於各種飲料的知識。我衷心推薦這間酒吧。這種有趣、有機和意想不到的體驗是我考慮返回台北的原因之一。

期待我的下次訪問。 🤍
EN:
I found this cool bar in the basement of the hotel to supply shochu (a Japanese whiskey). This wine is not common.The menu price is reasonable, which is advantage.She and I made friends with the super -friendly bartenders, and he knew very well about his craftsmanship.I went to two consecutive nights and learned a lot about various beverages from him.I sincerely recommend this bar.This interesting, organic, and unexpected experience is one of the reasons I consider returning to Taipei.

Looking forward to my next visit.Bleak

Original: 超級溫馨的盒子！專業調酒師！經常更新飲品菜單！絕對是重遊！

Original: 舒適的酒吧隱藏在公寓地下室，步行即可到達台北市政府。空間裝潢精美，非常適合小團體入住。羊老闆很詳細地解釋了每種酒的起源，看得出來他對自己的手藝非常自豪。如果您想在信義區享受獨特的體驗，強烈推薦這個酒吧！
EN: A comfortable bar hidden in the basement of the apartment, and you can reach the Taipei City Government.The space is exquisitely decorated, which is very suitable for small groups.The owner of the sheep explained in detail the origin of each wine, and it can be seen that he is very proud of his craftsmanship.If you want to enjoy a unique experience in Xinyi District, strongly recommend this bar!

Original: 與朋友在綿羊酒吧度過了美好的夜晚。管家非常友善，飲料和服務都很棒。為了創造出味道極佳的飲料，我們花了很多心思。 10/10 絕對會再來！
EN: Live a beautiful night with a friend at the lamb bar.The housekeeper is very friendly, and drinks and services are great.In order to create excellent flavors, we spent a lot of thoughts.10/10 will definitely come again!
